name: Terrible Meal
description:
Your a servant to the beasts. You need to feed them. But you can free yourself. You can overfeed them. The beasts like to chew on potatoes, and the magic book tells you who wants what, but only baked potatoes might get them fat & explode.

Explode them all before the time runs out!

Controlls: WSAD + Mouse, Keys: 1,2,3 to shoot different potatoes.
